remarks: The absolute value distributes under division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abv0.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvneg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvrec.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
abvdiv.p $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
abvdiv $p |- ( ( ( R e. DivRing /\ F e. A ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Y =/= .0. ) ) -> ( F ` ( X ./ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) / ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
